title: Amid Rhetoric About Rupture With U.S., Finland Urges Calm
summary_full: “We don’t need a bulldozer,” says Alexander Stubb, Finland’s president and a golf partner of President Trump. “Reform doesn’t mean destruction.”
summary_public: “We don’t need a bulldozer,” says Alexander Stubb, Finland’s president and a golf partner of President Trump. “Reform doesn’t mean destruction.”

FI.label: positive
FI.evidence: Finland Urges Calm “We don’t need a bulldozer,” says Alexander Stubb
